results.display_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
results.headline: Class Dismissed
results.summary_short: Childhood ends with tears and howls and swirls of smoke, the shock of mortality and bittersweet smiles in the grave, deeply satisfying final movie in the “Harry Potter” series.

results.display_title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
results.headline: Time for Young Wizards to Put Away Childish Things
results.summary_short: There is an especially somber and scary coloration to this installment, as Harry Potter faces a perilous grown-up world.
